question: Which among the following statements is correct ?
option1: A joint sitting of both the houses of the parliament is summoned and presided by President
option2: A joint sitting of both the houses of the parliament is summoned and presided by Speaker of the Lok Sabha
option3: A joint sitting of both the houses of the parliament is summoned by President and presided by Speaker of Lok Sabha
option4: A joint sitting of both the houses of the parliament is summoned by Speaker of Lok Sabha and presided by President
answer: A joint sitting of both the houses of the parliament is summoned by President and presided by Speaker of Lok Sabha
explanation: A joint sitting of both the houses (i.e., the Lok Sabha and the Rajya Sabha) of the parliament of India is summoned by President and presided by Speaker of Lok Sabha.
